leftHalf.title: Email Security
leftHalf.copy:
__A low-touch, high-efficacy email security service__

Effortlessly block and isolate phishing threats, including email-borne malware, business email compromise, and multi-channel (link-based) attacks.

primaryCta.elementName: Assess your phishing risk - Primary CTA - /lp/emailsecurity/

columnContent.title: Phishing protection that goes beyond email
columnContent.description: Protect against targeted phishing attacks that use a combination of email and other apps to exploit users and gain unauthorized access.

columnContent.title: Easy implementation and management
columnContent.description: Benefit from industry-leading threat detection without having to constantly tune policies and configurations.

columnContent.title: Greater value, lower cost
columnContent.description: Save time, money, and your sanity — all while catching the phishing threats that others miss.

relatedBlades.title: Identify and remediate phishing exposure to secure your workforce
relatedBlades.copy:
__Microsoft 365 users:__ Run a free [phishing retro scan](https://www.cloudflare.com/lp/phishing-retro-scan/) to identify active threats currently sitting in your inboxes. 

__Gmail users:__ Request a [free phishing risk assessment](https://www.cloudflare.com/lp/emailsecurity/) to see how your existing security controls stack up.

Then deploy Email Security inline (as MX), via API, or in mix-mode with the benefits of inline and post-delivery retraction.

relatedBlades.title: Learn about trending threats in Cloudflare's 2023 Phishing Report

buttonOne.elementName: Cloud Email Security - ADDITIONAL OFFER BLADE - CTA

columnContent.title: Cloudflare named a Leader in the Forrester Wave: Enterprise Email Security, Q2 2023
columnContent.description: Cloudflare received the highest score in Strategy. We believe this recognition highlights our rapid pace of innovation and groundbreaking approach to protecting users across all channels.

columnContent.title: Cloudflare named in the 2024 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Security Service Edge (SSE)
columnContent.description: We believe this recognition is a testament to Cloudflare's single-vendor SASE platform and its ability to modernize your network and consolidate more use cases.

columnContent.title: Cloudflare named a "Leader" in 2023 KuppingerCole Leadership Compass for SASE
columnContent.description: Through its 2023 SASE market analysis, KuppingerCole Analysts AG cited several Cloudflare strengths such as our large globally distributed presence and sophisticated traffic acceleration, massive backbone capacity, 100% uptime guarantee, and innovative Remote Browser Isolation.

content.value: "Since we implemented Cloudflare we have seen a 50% reduction in the number of malicious or suspicious emails our users receive every day. That frees up multiple hours we can reinvest into other goals."
Director of Cyber Security — Werner Enterprises

relatedBlades.title: Deliver continuous protection against known and emerging phishing tactics, even those designed to evade traditional security controls

columnContent.title: Block and isolate multi-channel attacks
columnContent.description: Insulate employees from link-based attacks that exploit users across various applications, including QR-code and deferred attacks.

columnContent.title: Stop business email compromise (BEC) attacks
columnContent.description: Detect deceptive attacks that impersonate employees and vendors with the aim of stealing data and extracting fraudulent payments.

columnContent.title: Prevent ransomware and other malware-based attacks
columnContent.description: Defend against dangerous attachments and links that attempt to deploy malicious software on end-user devices.

relatedBlades.htmlContent: Explore more use cases

relatedBlades.description: Helping organizations worldwide secure their workforces against phishing
